price: Ṣé wọn kò rí àwọn ẹyẹ tí ó wà ní òkè wọn, tí (wọ́n) ń na ìyẹ́ apá (wọn), tí wọ́n sì ń pa á mọ́ra? Kiní kan kò mú wọn dúró (sínú òfurufú) àfi Àjọkẹ́-ayé. Dájúdájú Òun sì ni Olùríran nípa gbogbo n̄ǹkan.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيۡرِ فَوۡقَهُمۡ صَٰٓفَّٰتٖ وَيَقۡبِضۡنَۚ مَا يُمۡسِكُهُنَّ إِلَّا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءِۭ بَصِيرٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw ilā al-ṭayri fawqahum ṣāffātin wayaqbiḍ'na mā yum'sikuhunna illā al-raḥmānu innahu bikulli shayin baṣīrun
